name: CLINDAMYCIN PHOSPHATE

ingredients.name: CARBOMER HOMOPOLYMER TYPE B (ALLYL PENTAERYTHRITOL CROSSLINKED)

indications: clindamycin phosphate gel indicated treatment acne vulgaris . view potential diarrhea , bloody diarrhea pseudomembranous colitis , physician consider whether agents appropriate ( , ) .
contraindications: apply thin film clindamycin phosphate gel twice daily affected area .
warningsAndPrecautions: clindamycin phosphate gel usp , 1 % clear , colorless gel containing clindamycin phosphate equivalent 10 mg clindamycin per gram available following sizes : 30 gram tube—ndc 46708-623-30 60 gram tube—ndc 46708-623-60 store 20° 25°c ( 68° 77°f ) ; excursions permitted 15° 30°c ( 59° 86°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . protect freezing . preserve tight containers . rx manufactured : alembic pharmaceuticals limited ( derma division ) , karakhadi , vadodara 391450 , india . mfg . license . : g/28/1626 revised : 3/2025
adverseReactions: clindamycin phosphate gel contraindicated individuals history hypersensitivity preparations containing clindamycin lincomycin , history regional enteritis ulcerative colitis , history antibiotic-associated colitis .
indications_original: Clindamycin phosphate gel is indicated in the treatment of acne vulgaris. In view of the potential for diarrhea, bloody diarrhea and pseudomembranous colitis, the physician should consider whether other agents are more appropriate (see CONTRAINDICATIONS, WARNINGS and ADVERSE REACTIONS).
contraindications_original: Apply a thin film of clindamycin phosphate gel twice daily to affected area.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Clindamycin phosphate gel USP, 1% is clear, colorless gel containing clindamycin phosphate equivalent to 10 mg clindamycin per gram is available in the following sizes:
                  
                     30 gram tube—NDC 46708-623-30
                  
                     60 gram tube—NDC 46708-623-60
                  Store at 20° to 25°C (68° to 77°F); excursions permitted between 15° to 30°C (59° to 86°F) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature].
                  Protect from freezing.
                  Preserve in tight containers.
                  
                     Rx only
                  
                  Manufactured by:
                  
                     Alembic Pharmaceuticals Limited
                  
                  (Derma Division),
                  Karakhadi, Vadodara 391450, India.
                  Mfg. License No.: G/28/1626
                  Revised: 3/2025
adverseReactions_original: Clindamycin phosphate gel is contraindicated in individuals with a history of hypersensitivity to preparations containing clindamycin or lincomycin, a history of regional enteritis or ulcerative colitis, or a history of antibiotic-associated colitis.
